goals.name: Avoid[Miners In FloodedMine]
goals.definition: Miners may never be blocked in a flooded mine

goals.name: Maintain[High Water Detected]
goals.definition: Each sump will be be equipped with water-level sensors to detect when the water is above a high or below a low level.

goals.name: Maintain[Pump Switch On If High Water Detected]
goals.definition: When the high water level is detected, the pump switch is on

goals.name: Maintain[PumpOn If High Water Detected]
goals.definition: When the high water level is detected, the pump is on

goals.name: Maintain[PumpOn If High Water]
goals.definition: When the water level is high, the pump must be on.

goals.name: Maintain[PumpOn IIf Pump Switch On]
goals.definition: Every time the pump switch is on, the pump is on as well

goals.name: Maintain[Sump Pumped Out If High Water]
goals.definition: When the water level is high, sumps are always pumped out so that miner are never blocked inside a pumped mine.

domain_hypotheses.name: DomHyp[No Excessive Water Flow]
domain_hypotheses.definition: By hypothesis, we consider that the water flow is not excessive according to the number of pumps in the mine

domain_hypotheses.name: DomHyp[Sufficient Pump Capacity]
domain_hypotheses.definition: By hypothesis, we consider that the mine is sufficiently equiped with well chosen pump capacities

domain_hypotheses.name: DomHyp[Sumps Well Distributed]
domain_hypotheses.definition: By hypothesis, mine sumps are well distributed

domain_hypotheses.name: DomHyp[Water Pumped Out If PumpOn]
domain_hypotheses.definition: By hypothesis, we consider that if a pump is on, it pumps water out

agents.name: HighWaterSensor
agents.description: Legacy sensor for measuring water level

agents.name: SafetyController
agents.description: Software to develop to control the pumps inside the mine
